options: A key from a different database
A key that uniquely identifies a row
A key used to reference another table
correctAnswer: A key used to reference another table

questionText: Which of the following is not a principle of OOP?

options: Copying data from one object to another
Deriving a new class from an existing one
correctAnswer: Deriving a new class from an existing one
